Quick Start

Installation 
npm install @ph-gov-icons/react
Usage 
import { PhFlag, Malacanang, DepEd, DOH } from '@ph-gov-icons/react';

function App() {
  return (
    <div>
      <PhFlag size={24} color="#0033A0" />
      <Malacanang size={32} color="#1B5E20" />
      <DepEd size={24} color="#FF6B35" />
      <DOH size={24} color="#28a745" />
    </div>
  );
}
Installation 
npm install @ph-gov-icons/vue
Usage 
<template>
  <div>
    <PhFlag :size="24" color="#0033A0" />
    <Malacanang :size="32" color="#1B5E20" />
    <DepEd :size="24" color="#FF6B35" />
    <DOH :size="24" color="#28a745" />
  </div>
</template>

<script setup>
import { PhFlag, Malacanang, DepEd, DOH } from '@ph-gov-icons/vue'
</script>
Installation 
npm install @ph-gov-icons/angular
Usage 
import { Component } from '@angular/core';

@Component({
  selector: 'app-root',
  template: `
    <div>
      <ph-flag [size]="24" color="#0033A0"></ph-flag>
      <malacanang [size]="32" color="#1B5E20"></malacanang>
      <dep-ed [size]="24" color="#FF6B35"></dep-ed>
      <doh [size]="24" color="#28a745"></doh>
    </div>
  `
})
export class AppComponent {}
Installation 
npm install @ph-gov-icons/svelte
Usage 
<script>
  import { PhFlag, Malacanang, DepEd, DOH } from '@ph-gov-icons/svelte';
</script>

<div>
  <PhFlag size={24} color="#0033A0" />
  <Malacanang size={32} color="#1B5E20" />
  <DepEd size={24} color="#FF6B35" />
  <DOH size={24} color="#28a745" />
</div>
Installation 
npm install @ph-gov-icons/css
Usage 
<!-- Import CSS -->
<link rel="stylesheet" href="node_modules/@ph-gov-icons/css/dist/ph-gov-icons.css">

<!-- Use icons -->
<i class="ph-icon ph-icon-ph-flag ph-icon-lg ph-icon-primary"></i>
<i class="ph-icon ph-icon-malacanang ph-icon-lg ph-icon-secondary"></i>
<i class="ph-icon ph-icon-deped ph-icon-lg ph-icon-accent"></i>
<i class="ph-icon ph-icon-doh ph-icon-lg ph-icon-success"></i>
Installation 
npm install @ph-gov-icons/web-components
Usage 
<!-- Import components -->
<script type="module" src="node_modules/@ph-gov-icons/web-components/dist/index.js"></script>

<!-- Use components -->
<ph-icon-ph-flag size="24" color="#0033A0"></ph-icon-ph-flag>
<ph-icon-malacanang size="32" color="#1B5E20"></ph-icon-malacanang>
<ph-icon-deped size="24" color="#FF6B35"></ph-icon-deped>
<ph-icon-doh size="24" color="#28a745"></ph-icon-doh>

Icon Gallery

CLI Tool

Use our powerful CLI tool to manage icons and contribute to the library.

üöÄ Easy Icon Management

Add, remove, and manage icons with simple commands

üîç Auto-Detection

Automatically recognizes common Philippine government agencies

üß™ Test Generation

Automatically generates test files for visual verification

Install CLI Tool 
npm run cli:install
Add New Icon 
bettergovicon process path/to/icon.svg
